meanings.sent1: In the story, the archangels protected the kingdom from evil.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe that archangels watch over them.
meanings.sent3: The archangels had a meeting to discuss their heavenly duties.
meanings.sent4: She felt as powerful as an archangel when she stood up for what was right.
meanings.sent5: The image of the archangels in the painting was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: The children imagined archangels flying among the stars.
meanings.sent2: Legends speak of archangels descending from the heavens to help humans.
meanings.sent3: The archangels decided to take a vacation on the moon.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like music from the archangels.
meanings.sent5: The night sky was filled with the shimmering light of archangels.
